{"id":287733323,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 9 months","timestamp":1577011520,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"112 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/287733323/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome II","memory":"21.8 MB","code":"bool isPalindrome(const string_view& s) {\n    size_t sz = s.size();\n    for(size_t i = 0; i < sz / 2; ++i) if (s[i] != s[sz - i - 1]) return false;\n    return true;\n}\n\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    bool validPalindrome(string s) {\n        size_t sz = s.size();\n        \n        for(size_t i = 0; i < sz / 2; ++i) if (s[i] != s[sz - i - 1]) {\n            string_view temp1 = string_view(s.data() + i + 1, sz - 2 * i - 1);\n            if(isPalindrome(temp1)) return true;\n\n            string_view temp2 = string_view(s.data() + i, sz - 2 * i - 1);\n            if(isPalindrome(temp2)) return true;\n\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome-ii"}
